蔛字的基本解释

蔛
hú
〔石蔛〕一种草本植物，茎入药。

蔛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hú］
［《廣韻》胡谷切，入屋，匣。］
(1)即石斛。
(2)即蔛草。参见“蔛草”。

蔛字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蔛； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1054第30
【唐韻】胡谷切，音縠。【集韻】石蔛，藥草也。【本草】蔛草，一名蔛萊，一名蔛榮。

蔛字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体旧字形
蔛字的起名意思

暂无。

蔛
Basic explanation of words
蔛
hú
〔Stone 蔛〕A herbaceous plant whose stem is used as medicine.
蔛
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hú］
["Guangyun" Hu Guqie, enter the house, box. ]
(1) That is Dendrobium.
(2) That is, cypress. See "Mushroom".
蔛
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Ke Zi] 　蔛; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 1054 to 30
[Tang Yun] Hu Guqie, sound 縠. 【Jiyun】Stone 蔛, medicinal herbs. 【Materia Medica】Mencao, one is Nie Lai and the other is Nie Rong.
